event.title: Keynote "FFmpeg's FFV1 lossless video codec: A Free Software success story" at OSCAL in Tirana, Albania

body.p: From May 9 to 10 there will be the second edition of the Open Source Conference Albania (OSCAL). Peter Bubestinger, FSFE's coordinator Austria, gives a keynote about "FFmpeg's FFV1 lossless video codec: A Free Software success story" and insights about video editing using Free Software. FSFE will be present with an information booth.
